alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 12:25AM PDT until October 27 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected near Bishop. Even colder temperatures are expected by Sunday morning encompassing much of the Owens Valley floor. * WHERE...Owens Valley. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. This warning signals the end of the growing season for the region.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
